name: Frogoban
description:
Frogoban is a twist on the classic Sokoban style game. Rather than having various different levels each with its own puzzle; FROGOBAN has a single open-world level with a variety of puzzles, collectables, and amphibian friends.

CONTROLS

  • WASD - move
  • R - restarts current screen

Game was made for MiniJam 79 over 3 days.

I'm not the best puzzle designer, but I hope it's fun :)
